effect.sun-moon: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.

flavor_text.sun-moon: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
